actions.text: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Hanna to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Hanna to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the engineering industry provides critical technical expertise, innovation, and local expertise to federal and state agencies to efficiently deliver surface transportation projects and urges the Secretary to reinforce these partnerships.
